text: @George_Osborne @MattHancock Hell, clap, clap, clap, clap.... How about: he coveted this government position. He stumbled into it somehow. He is now responsible for the #NHS. He's obliged to deliver tests and guidance to the country. And he took fucking ages to do it. Shambles and shameful. #COVID19
